Trade/Device Name(s): ELITech Clinical Systems ISE Total CO2 Electrode
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): ELITech Clinical Systems Selectra ProM analyzer with ISE module
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for ELITech Clinical Systems ISE Total CO2 Electrode and ISE Calibrators for quantitative determination and calibration of CO2, sodium, potassium, and chloride on Selectra ProM analyzer.
Indications for Use Summary: ISE CO2 electrode is intended for quantitative in vitro diagnostic determination of Total CO2 in human serum and plasma; ISE Calibrators are for calibration of sodium, potassium, chloride, and CO2 on ELITech Clinical Systems Selectra ProM analyzer.
